title: So is "Nig*a" "Cu*t" "Dumbcu*t" and all other racial come other verbal abuses allowed on oce now?o.O
body:
So is "Nig_a" "C_nt" "Dumbcu_t" and all other racial come other verbal abuses allowed in Oceania now??
I have repeatedly reported these abusers including details on which time they commented even, only to find them next game or next to next one? Whereas the Garena server is auto banning anyone typing C_nt or Dumbc_nt once? or are those rioters more active than this server.

All these confusions led me to believe that verbal abusing must be getting promoted in Ocenia for a better competitive environment now, which sounds brilliant.
If it really is so then I need to know too so that I can fully utilize them as well, TiA {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body:
They should ban players for one hour for typing certain words, like the ones OP mentioned, including some others.
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I agree. It is one thing to say a bad word, it is an entirely different thing to sabotage the team or harass another player.
So many people on OCE are toxic there are not a lot of "GOOD" / "Well Mannered" people much anymore , if I am wrong they must be rare to find.

To be honest i find most of the toxic ones are players from KR or chinese servers who come to OCE to troll or think they are good. Most don't communicate well and lose their cool over small things like warding on top of their ward by accident and the like. I once had an ADC leave because he placed his ward on my ward when i went to ward river, he spammed in chat  a little in English then spammed in his own language then left. 

The rest who are aussies tend to be just trolls who act out and be twats on chat because they are trying to impress their duo partner they know from school "oh look how cool i am i am talking crap to people in game hurrrrrrrrrr".

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=VQfR7nAn,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:31:27.811+0000)
>
> To be honest i find most of the toxic ones are players from KR or chinese servers who come to OCE to troll or think they are good. Most don't communicate well and lose their cool over small things like warding on top of their ward by accident and the like. I once had an ADC leave because he placed his ward on my ward when i went to ward river, he spammed in chat  a little in English then spammed in his own language then left. 
> 
> The rest who are aussies tend to be just trolls who act out and be twats on chat because they are trying to impress their duo partner they know from school "oh look how cool i am i am talking crap to people in game hurrrrrrrrrr".

I've personally never seen "Korean" trolls, in fact I have almost never seen a player tying Korean, let alone their trolls. I've personally seen more French speakers than Korean.

And a lot of the "Chinese" trolls are in reality just Aussie trolls who are also bad in English for whatever reason. The reason for that is because they don't actually know what the meaning of the whatever they say is, if you are bothered enough to quiz them on it (for instance, I've got 3 people spamming "sb" in my match today, and none of them actually really know what "sb" or "shabi" are despite their frequent spamming of the terms, when I quizzed them in the post-game lobby. They thought it is a load-word meant to be "so bad", when in reality the term means "idiot"); they seem to just be copy-pasting, which also unintentionally or intentionally forward this stereotype.

Maybe Ranked has more of the actually toxic Chinese players, and if they come in premades (but then again, most premades are toxic to begin with, for 1 reason or the other), but in solo Normals I'd find most of them are not speakers of the language but English trolls who use copy-pasta as feints.

OCE is toxic, thats for sure tho.

I think in almost 6 years I can recall maybe 3 games where there was something obviously Korean, and none of it struck me as toxic, by action, context or otherwise.

For the longest time though I did think sb was 'so bad' in the way of lol and afk etc. Contextually it made sense and I had no evidence to the contrary, nor am I the type to say it with either meaning. I wouldn't be at all surprised if sb is misunderstood by a significant chunk of people, nor would I use it as any accurate gauge of ethnicity.

And even if they _are _ Chinese, a troll is a troll, doesn't matter where they come from right? I'm of the mindset that we only notice the foreign ones more because it's different, rather than there actually being more of them.

I had someone in my last game call me a "C_nt" several times, said I was foreign even though we are both Australia all because I didn't understand the slang he was using and that I didn't know proper English. He then asked for where I live and then went on to call me a "b_tch" and that he's going to murder me and my family (I did say to him after that remark that I'll kill him if he turns up at my house (which I doubt he would). I have children and no one hurts my children or threatens to). This all started just because I asked him what "Deets" is. I've since reported and blocked him but the amount of toxic people I've had to deal with recently has been appalling. His gamer name is [removed] and I really hope he gets Permabanned.

Dont bother about those kind of people. Most likely they have nothing good going on for them inlife. Filled with resentments due to the lack of care or love; It is very easy to agitate them. Those who have good things happening to them are less likely to act malicious. So dont get angry about it.

i get banned in oce for callig people bad and clueless yet i report players who tell me to kys or other abuse and they still play games looking in there match history 

for some reason some bans take 3 games to trigger thats why you get the 3 games worth of logs but other ban sonly take 1 mine was a 10 game chat restriction for 1 game yet my mate was extremely abuseing and got a ban after 3 games i dont understand but its like they're trating negativity and toxicity the exact same

[REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

current situation lmao
LMFAO so the guy typing nig*ers in game is not banned but my screenshot showing what he typed is ?!?!? nuice! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Since when is the C word a racial slurr? I am all for the N word being slammed with a ban and other racial slurrs but c u n t isn't that bad a word in Australia and i call my brother one and friends one all the time, and i love those people. I don't think i call anyone i hate a c u n t.

Well I’m going to quote idubbbz here and say either all of it’s allowed or non of it is what I mean is saying fuck you is allowed but %%%%% isn’t becuase of its history and yet words like slut %%%% %%%got ect are more tolerable but %%%%% is just the worst thing ever just becuase it has history but then other words aren’t because they don’t have such a negative history yet they still have a history so it’s your choice are going to say all cuss word should be banned or non of them. so I don’t think that if u say the word %%%%% it should be bannable but if you use it in an insulting or racist way then yes e.g “you fucking %%%%% go back to work you worthless piece of shit,” that’s racist and I’d say that’s reportable but something like “this renekton is such a %%%%%” that’s not rascist and shouldn’t be reportable (also I’m still pissed I got a 14 day banned for calling a Sudra a fat slut for taking all the cs and the shyv a %%% for being afk for 30 mins and talking about how bs rape culture is) so it’s up to you either all of its ok or non of it is.
I mean if you're talking all or nothing then I think you need to consider the distinction between swears and slurs. Swears are generally fine, slurs used as swears not so much.

Doesn't matter if it does, RITO doesn't care.
They care more about banning and punishing people calling rito or the trolls they support out.

Ritos logic:
playing in peace = bad
ruining the game = good

I feel that riot does somewhat care since I write reports on both in-game client and on https://support.riotgames.com of the offending summoners and also follow up by looking them up on oce.op.gg and find that their account has been banned since there is no more history of their games. Support does not like me reporting to them but that is how I can provide them hard evidence of the offence and have a human looking into it. They keep asking me to report using the built-in-game client instant feedback system(that I feel does not work) and I do but I take the extra step to make sure the offending summoner does not get away with their offence.

It common sense man.
Even IRL justice systems don't deal with offences instantly.

Unless you want us all to live in a dictatorship regime where you get shot the instant you step out of line, no questions asked. I would suggest being less of a snowflake.

____________________________

> All these confusions led me to believe that verbal abusing must be getting promoted in Ocenia for a better competitive environment now, which sounds brilliant.

By your own logic, because we haven't caught every single murderer in the world, murder must be legal right? 

______________________________

Yes, It can be incredibly frustrating to see a toxic player ruin another game as well.  We have ALL experienced that. We ALL have frustration when it comes to toxicity. 

But even angels have bad days. 
maybe their dog died, their GF left them, they failed an exam, whatever. Then some cocky ass little shit of a Zed pokes them with a stick all game and they snap and say a bad word. **Instaban.**

The system has to punish true toxic people, while not dragging people like that down with them _(otherwise there would be no one left to play the game)_. That is why a single report from a single person wont instaban someone that very moment for saying the word 'crap'.
I would love to see your source on the statement you made about Garena.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=VQfR7nAn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-21T10:18:56.847+0000)

> By your own logic, because we haven't caught every single murderer in the world, murder must be legal right? 



no By my logic, as 20 reported murderers, who were caught red handed along with enough evidence, are walking about free without any sort of punishments, murdering people must be normal to the authority
 

also, I never wanted every single offender to get caught, I only asked why more than 15-20 reported legit acts of toxicity violating racial and community rules were left unpunished. I am not here to cry after I saw one player flame and not get punished. Playing for 5 years in more than 5 servers, I know not every report is punished. However, every major act of abuse up until the legacy client time period were being punished. Like constant abusive conversations, the n word or racist comments. But last year and this no reports were met with any bans or warnings even, not only for me others in my club also reported the same thing. Check out the club "Antitoxic people" with AnTox clubtag and its members' report history too for more {{summoner:13}} .

I understand having bad days, but I dont understand supporting abusive behaviors for having a bad day. I wont go back to my home having a bad day and beat up my wife for my bad mood. or else I would get "reported" and caught my the authority lol

As I said I have played through various accounts, and yes Instaban is a thing that riot already practices. I once got instabanned from my then main account for running elobuddy just once. No warning, no nothing. My 2 years were thrown down the drain after one aram match with a message saying my accounts permanently banned till some 300years later date.
Check my account in Oce named "Gema" for source of incident above.
So if my 2 years of good behavior and dedication can go down the drain for one third party app usage, a saints racist abusive behavior can certainly be instabanned, permabanned. There's a reason why lol is considered a game with one of the most toxic communities out there, part of it is the authorities leniency.

Lmao wanna know my source on the statement I made about Garena?
"smrturzo"
my own account got permabanned directly after flaming a mundo (calling him a "dumbf_g" ofc) for flaming in malay language after building weird shits, in ANOTHER aram match, hmm starting to see a pattern here..<wink wink> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
[(http://www.mediafire.com/view/ad119hzaimkc5jx/Screenshot%20%2877%29.png
[(http://www.mediafire.com/view/5j26pm85rslcuqt/Screenshot%20%2878%29.png

> But even angels have bad days. 
> maybe their dog died, their GF left them, they failed an exam, whatever. Then some cocky ass little shit of a Zed pokes them with a stick all game and they snap and say a bad word. **Instaban.**

I was having a bad day too, I was indeed *Instabanned** xD

Trust me I have seen much worse abusive language practice in Oceania. Two premades were once discussing about peeling their mums' skins off and eating them. Cu_t is a normal addressing here. f_g is a community allowed word lol. I have reported abuse of N_gga so many times. Only to find them again in my match later. or check there match history to see that they're still playing, unharmed.




league has over 80 million monthly players now probably, I don't think permabanning 20 million of them would kill the game. Rather it would inspire the 30 million back who quit cz they were flamed at intro bots for dying :)

c-nt is not a racial slur and in Australia is considered normal (I don't say it but w.e), but n word should be banned. I guess it's a carry-over from NA since in NA some people say n-gga (NOT n-ggER) the same way they use 'bro'. The system otherwise bases its response to a single word based on how many times it has been reported, so just report and move on.

I'm actually quite unsettled with the poll votes where "Be more toxic" is the better option than "Be quiet". I keep saying over and over to my friends that also play LoL that this environment, for the past ~5 years I've played this game, that toxic will only breed more toxic. And I guess this kinda reflects that. 

Honestly though, I would hope that more people would choose to "be quiet" since spending time being a keyboard warrior afk ingame won't win the game. By using the mute function, or pretending you have muted (to screenshot toxic conversations), it gives them less excuse to continue flaming, and I have had cases where players have just stopped and as a TEAM, we played better, and won.

I've much more to say but I'll leave it as is :)

lol u should understand the sarcasm of the poll bro, if "be more toxic" becomes a viable option then understand what kind of an environment the game has today
I've had a wonderful run in lol for almost 5 years too, even opened up the club with antitoxic motto, but last 2 years tho..
idk if its because my mmr improved and I'm in a somewhat better & more toxic elo but yeah, I get surprised (ultra mega giga surprised) if someone in my team dies 3 times in a row and nobody flames him.
However I am derailing here..my point is not to get rid of toxicity, its to get rid of the legit reported ones "*at least*".

I always get an instant feedback message when I report for people saying those things.
Hell just the other night my friend and I cheered when we got an instant feedback message saying that the person we reported in the previous match had been permabanned.

%%%% however shouldn't be in the instant ban list for OCE, it's the most used word in Australian language and is culturally significant word here...
